title: CIL Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 125 Industrial Trainee Posts
description: The Coal India Limited (CIL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 125 Industrial Trainee Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 12th, CA can apply for the CIL Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to...
